segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost sad how she's missing everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really putting himself at risk for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl is being careful, but she's still part of the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman might be disappointed if she catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing is just adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sorry for the woman; she's going to have a big mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene compared to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a metaphor for the calm before the storm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices the children before they get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
